articles.description:
Don't sleep on @azuroprotocol which has already confirmed an $AZUR token.
Unlike Rollbit or other centralized casinos it's operating entirely on-chain and users keep custody of their funds.
You earn points which will translate into future $AZUR tokens by betting on sports games https://t.co/qiOIbSe6r6
